examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please i dont have money for this subscription and I cancelled it a while back and removed my card how did yall charge me

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I canceled my subscription in December 2020 and removed the payment options but I am still being charged for this. I received in a confirmation that my account was deleted. I would like to receive a refund and my account closed. Please let me know what i need to do this.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I received a charge for my account but never signed up for a free trial or pro or anything.  Please refund that and ensure that I am removed from that list
What is your problem with ?: Other Describe the problem .: They removed money from the card, although I refused to subscribe, I used the trial version for less than a month. Return the money!!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Was billed for renewal Jan 11 but I already had turned off auto renewal. My invoices even show it stopped but then began again in Jan. Was wondering if this is because i did not remove my credit card? And if not what caused the auto renew to turn back on. I have already cancelled my subscription again and removed my credit card. Looking to get the charge refunded as I ended it as soon as I seen the email. Thank you for any assistance on the matter hope you have a great day.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello!

I thought I had removed my Canva Pro trial at the beginning of my trial. I have just received an email that my account was charged for a year's prescription. I would like this to be refunded as I thought I had already removed the trial for Canva Pro.

Sorry for the trouble! I would love to have this service, but I can't afford it at this time. 

Thank you!

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I removed auto renew yet it still charged me. I have now cancelled my subscription

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I would like a refund. I cancelled my subscription and I was never refunded. Please remove me from Canva.

Nº da fatura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I added my credit card to use the free trial of Canva for Work and was charged before the end of 30-day free. I would like to ask for a refund, to cancel my subscription and to remove my credit card number from Canva because I am not using the service anymore.

Thanks

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I added my credit card to use the free Canva for Work trial and was charged before the end of the free 30 days. I would like to request a refund, cancel my subscription and remove my Canva credit card number because I am no longer using the service. Sincerely

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I added my credit card to use the free Canva for Work trial and was charged before the end of the free 30 days. I would like to request a refund, cancel my subscription and remove my Canva credit card number because I am no longer using the service. Sincerely

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I don’t want to subscribe to this app. Please remove me and refund my money please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am being charged for a subscription that I cancelled in September and I am wanting a refund and for 4 months and for my card to be removed.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, 
Can you please stop charging me. I cancelled my subscription already and in fact logged an issue for the same and again I have beeen charged. Please reverse the charge and remove my card details from your system.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have been removed from Canva Pro trial before my 30 days.  I have subscription until 12th February.

This is really disappointing as I need to use this for my work today.

I hope my card is not going to be charged early for an automatic renewal.

Could you please look into this.

Many thanks

<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I canceled my subscription a few weeks ago and it just charged me. I would like the charge removed from my credit card. Thanks.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: The trial subscription was canceled on October 8th and the app was removed. I did not make a paid subscription. Get a refund!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I had cancelled my Canva subscription and then today I received notification that I had been charged again.  The INVOICE # is <NUMBER>. Please remove the charge and make sure this subscription is cancelled.  I am very frustrated.

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I canceled the free trial before the period ended and I was charged for two months of subscription, right after I canceled and removed my card from the app.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please cancel my subscription and return my payment back I will remove my credit card after you refund it because I want to take effect of the refund first. Please I don't need a subscription.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have cancelled my subscription so I don't know why I am still being charged for this. I cancelled my subscription in November last year!!! 
I also removed my credit card details so no more charges would be made to it, clearly you have not removed the details which is concerning

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: REQUEST OF REFUND

Hi!

I have availed the 1 month free subscription then removed my credit card details immediately as I am not interested to renew it or continue but I am not sure how I was charged for 2 months. November and December 2020. Request you to please review the same and do the needful for the refund.

Thanks!

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I added my credit card to use the free Canva for Work trial and was charged before the end of the free 30 days. I would like to request a refund, cancel my subscription and remove my Canva credit card number because I am no longer using the service. Sincerely

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I canceled and removed this app from my phone and was charged. I'm requesting a refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled last month and it still processed for January. I just cancelled again and removed payment option.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I would like to request a refund for the subscription being renewed yesterday. I actually had no idea i was being charged for this, as i forgot to cancel my subscription. I have ended it and removed my card linked. Please refund, as i was only charged yesterday and have not been using your services. Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have been charged AGAIN for the monthly canva subscription. im not sure why this has happened as th eprevious email i was sent said that i am now on a free subscription and i will no longer be charged.

I would like my account removed from a subscription as discussed. Can you please refund me this amount again and cancel the paid subscription!!!!!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I did not sign up for a subscription. I have been charged multiple times for a service I am not using. Please remove my details and cancel my account

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am <NAME> a debut card transaction from your service. I do not have a paid subscription but my bank account is being charged monthly. I have followed your help recommendation to cancel but it states "No Subscription." When I am logged in I cannot remove the credit card since I do not have a subscription. All charges need to be stopped immediately!!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have been trying to unsubscribe for days and the page won’t load up. I do not want to be charged again or use this app, PLEASE REMOVE my subscription before it charges me again in 3 days!
What do you need help with?: I cancelled my free trial and removed my credit card but just received an email that I was charged?? I already paid for another account....

What type of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: Hello, since last month I removed the card from the account but still I was being charged, in the same way I canceled the subscription and I decided to close the account but still they continue to bill. I need an explanation now.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Once again, why am I being charged! I would like my card removed from my account and to be reimbursed. I never authorized any payments on my Canva account and this is the second time it has happened!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cannot seem to cancel my trial canva pro so that I wont be charged.  I've spent waaaayyy too much time trying to figure this out.  Please cancel the free trial and remove my credit card so i wont be charged.  thanks

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am not using the CANVA services at all! I asked Paypal to remove all my subscriptions. Apparently, they did not!!! I need an immediate refund. Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: hi! I keep getting charged by Canva, and I don't have a subscription. I would like to be refunded please and all my details removed! 
thank you,
Isis

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I would like to unsubscribe immediately. I have been charged every month for canva and have not used it. Please remove me and my payments.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: This transaction not form my side without authorized, Form your software deduct money form my <NAME> card, i am happy with your free version please refund me money. please next time i removed my credit card.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have no idea what this charge is for or how it was even charged to my card but would like it removed and whatever subscription it may be attached to be removed as well. I did not sign up for not agree to any subscription nor would I like to sign up for one. Please refund this charge right away.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was charged for a monthly subscription of Canva, but I had already canceled my subscription and removed my card from the payment options.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please refund my membership fees. I hate "free 30 days then x per month" because I literally try the software out, realise its useless and then move on and forget to remove the billing! I have recently been charged $17 on my card but have no interest in using canva. Please refund immediately.

Refund request reason: Was only trying to get more details about the Canvas Pro features. I didn't realize there was already a card on file that was going to be automatically charged. Please remove this subscription from my account and refund immediately to card.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I tried to cancel 1 day before the charge and I couldn't. My card was charged. I canceled now. I would like, if possible, to reverse the amount on the card and remove the canva-pro from my account, since it says that it will be active until February 22nd.

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: I had tried Canvas Pro, but then I decided not to subscribe. Except that I completely forgot to unsubscribe from the service, now I see that there is an unpaid billing of 107 euros (because the combined card is empty). Do I have to pay them or can I cancel it and simply remove the pro?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please cancel my 30 day free trial and remove my credit card on file. I don’t not wish to subscribe.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My account is not picking up my Pro subscription I set up via ioS. I removed app and subscription and added both back. I am still unable to use Pro features.

What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: Hello I am vomiting the subscription that I canceled a long time ago and it will not let me delete the card. This I already checked from the App Store h I am not subscribed to canva. It is worth mentioning that they are charging me for a service that I do not have access to. Thank you for helping me remove my card and reimburse me for what I have been charged. <NAME>.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Unable to remove credit card, without canceling subscription. Is there a way around this?
